pageContext.claim: “I got rid of the individual mandate, the most -- the biggest part and the most unpopular thing in Obamacare, which really repeals Obamacare, because it can't live without the mandate, because that's where a lot of the money came.”
pageContext.analysis: Eliminating the individual mandate may weaken the Affordable Care Act, as it may lead to risk pools that are less healthy, but it does not wipe out the law.
